rules_text:
{2}, {T}: Tap target non-Wonder creature.
{2}, Sacrifice Curious Courier: Pursue Wonder. [i](Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“The Ilcans are violent, and we don't know what they're capable of. Keep the peace until we do.”
—Amarell, elder of New Tensuo[/i]
